ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
1 (3 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet

cookingTips: Ensure the brisket is fully submerged in liquid for even cooking
The spice packet is essential - do not discard it
Allow natural pressure release for 10-15 minutes before quick releasing
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through selecting quality corned beef and explain why the beer adds depth to the broth.
